text: Club Deportivo Universidad de Oviedo is the football club of the University of Oviedo, based in Oviedo, Asturias. It was founded in 1961 and it plays at Estadio Universitario San Gregorio, with a capacity of 4,000 seats. ==Club background== *Club Deportivo Universitario (1961–1970) *Club Atlético Universitario (1970–1987) *Asociación Deportiva Universidad de Oviedo (1987–2014) *Club Deportivo Universidad de Oviedo (2014–present)Club Deportivo Universidad de Oviedo ; AREFE Regional ==Season to season== {|
